name: RE:WIND
description:
RE:WIND

Utilize the ever-changing wind to control your kite and try to outrun fate in this atmospheric, endless runner.
Controls:

Arrow keys/AWSD to move, I/K to change kite's line length, esc/P - pause game

Made by 1.5 people in 5 days, for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2, theme rewind.

Main menu theme:

Original piece "REWIND" by Bertalicious.

Feel free to ask for sheet music ;)

Credits:

Running music:

Fragile by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon
